name: Jean Gunnhildr
title: Dandelion Knight
description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius in Mondstadt.

normalattack.name: Favonius Bladework
normalattack.description: Performs up to five consecutive strikes. When charged, launches enemies using wind then slowly makes them fall.

elementalskill.name: Gale Blade
elementalskill.description: Releases a miniature storm that launches enemies and deals Anemo DMG. When held, Jean commands the whirlwind to pull enemies towards her while she remains immobile.

elementalburst.name: Dandelion Breeze
elementalburst.description: Causes Anemo DMG to enemies while instantly healing nearby party members and allies.

passivetalent1.name: Guiding Breeze
passivetalent1.description: There's a 12% chance of getting two food items when achieving Perfect Cooking.

passivetalent2.name: Wind Companion
passivetalent2.description: Normal Attacks that land have 50% chance of regenerating HP for all party members equal to 15% of Jean's ATK.

passivetalent3.name: Let the Wind Lead
passivetalent3.description: Using Dandelion Breeze regenerates 20% of its Energy.

constellations.d1: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.
constellations.d2: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all enemies have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.c6: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.d6: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

profile.description: In her role as the Acting Grand Master of the Knights, Jean is shown to be formal and loyal at all times, taking every task she was given seriously. She is known to end all her missions with elegance and success, even in times of worries, she is not on to be easily fazed.

zhdescription: 正直严谨的蒲公英骑士，蒙德西风骑士团的代理团长。

zhnormalattack.name: 西风剑术
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击 
进行至多五段的连续剑击。 

重击
消耗一定体力，进行饱含风之力的挑击。被挑飞的敌人，在短时间内会缓慢坠落。

zhelementalskill.name: 风压剑
zhelementalskill.description:
将无形的风之力汇聚在剑上，释放微型的风暴，将敌人向瞄准的方向击飞，造成大量风元素伤害。

长按
以持续消耗体力为代价，令旋风将周围的敌人牵引至面前。可以调整方向。 期间无法移动。

zhelementalburst.name: 蒲公英之风
zhelementalburst.description: 呼唤风的护佑，创造千风涌动的蒲公英领域，击退周围的敌人并造成风元素伤害。同时，为队伍中的所有角色瞬间恢复大量生命值，回复量受益于琴的攻击力。 蒲公英领域 为其中的角色持续恢复生命值; 令其中的角色持续受到风元素影响; 对出入领域的敌人造成风元素伤害。 风的恩泽如同广布大地的蒲公英，这就是琴守护的根源与心意。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 顺风而行
zhpassivetalent1.description: 普通攻击命中时，有50%的几率为队伍中所有角色恢复等同于琴攻击力15%的生命值。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 听凭风引
zhpassivetalent2.description: 使用蒲公英之风后，会恢复20%元素能量。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 引领之风
zhpassivetalent3.description: 完美烹饪恢复类食物时，有12%概率获得2倍产出。

zhconstellations.d1: 风压剑长按超过1秒后，提升牵引速度，并使造成的伤害提升40%。
zhconstellations.d2: 获得元素晶球或元素微粒时，队伍中所有角色获得15％攻击速度和15％移动速度提升，持续15秒。
zhconstellations.d3: 蒲公英之风的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d4: 蒲公英领域内，所有敌人的风元素抗性下降40％。
zhconstellations.d5: 风压剑的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级)
zhconstellations.d6: 蒲公英领域内的角色受到的伤害降低35％。离开蒲公英领域后，这个效果会在承受3次攻击或10秒后消失
